template.name: Hello FreeRTOS
template.details:
Hello FreeRTOS uses the Real Time Engineers Ltd. FreeRTOS. You can use this example as a starting point for developing Nios II FreeRTOS applications. 
 
The BSP for this template is based on the FreeRTOS operating system. 
 
For information about how this software example relates to Nios II hardware design examples, 
refer to the Design Examples page of the Nios II documentation available with your installation at: 
<installation_directory>/nios2eds/documents/index.htm.
